snippet: Porto and Celtic took big steps toward the Champions League group stage as home teams struggled Wednesday in their first-leg matches in the playoff round.
abstract: Porto defeats Lille, 1-0, and Celtic gets draw, 1-1, at Maribor in Champions League play; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Porto and Celtic took big steps toward the Champions League group stage as home teams struggled Wednesday in their first-leg matches in the playoff round.
